ygData.subject: Re: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: As I said (and you ignored, as you usually do with anything you don t agree with, like many folks on this list) . . . it is not free if you can t kill
ygData.messageBody:
As I said (and you ignored, as you usually do with anything you don't agree
with, like many folks on this list) . . . it is not free if you can't kill
dervishes, and it IS possible to be a master smith of a level where you
can't kill them.

Not to mention, if you DIE while after the free ore, it's not a very good
bargain, is it?

----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Coan <COANJ@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 12:51 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banded Prices


> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Lavastorm, kill dervishes, ore IS free.
>
> (still wishes there were a skill cap on trade skills so there wouldn't be
so many lvl 5 master smiths in the game)
>
> >>> "Mathew E. Gray" <things@...> 7.14.99 2:22:14 PM >>>
> From: "Mathew E. Gray" <things@...>
>
> Ore isn't free.
>
> You cannot assume it to be free, despite what you may be able to gather,
not
> all smiths have a) the knowledge, or b) the ability to get free ore. Most
> of them have to pay for it.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jason Coan <COANJ@...>
> To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 7:50 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banded Prices
>
>
> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> >
> > ore...free
> > mold...few gold
> > water...few silver
> >
> > cost of materials is only a couple of plat, so for someone to sell a few
> gold above cost, the tunic would have to be no more than about 5
> plat....i've never seen anybody selling that cheap. 10plat a tunic is
still
> a big profit, 20plat a tunic is a huge profit, anything above 20plat is a
> rip off.
> >
> > > As for the fixed prices, I'm all for it. I haven't reached the level
> where
> > > I can make banded yet, but when I get there, I want more than a few
gold
> > > profit for my wares. I do have a further suggestion though. When you
> see
> > > people selling at a few gold above cost, bargain with them to get
their
> >
> >
